org.jgentleframework.configure
Interface Configurable

All Superinterfaces:
BindingConfig, CoreBinding, SystemConfig
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConfig, RmiService, WebAbstractConfig
public interface Configurable
extends SystemConfig, BindingConfig

All classes implement this interface must be abstract classes, calling configurable classes. The configurable class must overrides configure() method in order to specify configured information and also must not implement other abstract methods. All abstract methods except configure method will be generated by JGentle system when associated container is created.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
AbstractConfig, SystemConfig, BindingConfig
